Component.Name: EthernetManager
Component.Description: Monitors Ethernet traffic on all network sockets.

Alarm.Name: EthInterfaceTakenDownTrafficJam
Alarm.Text: Ethernet interface has been taken down because of too large traffic (over limit), interface index=N
Alarm.Description: Ethernet interface has been taken down because receiving more than the limit specified in LimitTrafficJamReceive_kB_sec. Text will be updated to contain interface index (0 or 1).

Alarm.Name: EthLinkDown_ETH0
Alarm.Text: ETH0 link is down (or error occurred).
Alarm.Description: ETH0 link is down (or error occurred).

Alarm.Name: EthLinkDown_ETH1
Alarm.Text: ETH1 link is down (or error occurred).
Alarm.Description: ETH1 link is down (or error occurred).

Parameter.Name: TCPmaxTransferUnitBody
Parameter.Description: Decides how TCP packets are sent (splitting into smaller packets or not). 0:Default value of 4096 will be used. TCP packets larger than this limit, will be split. Negative value:There will be no splitting in smaller TCP packets. Positive value: This value will be used (will minimum become size CDP_TCP_MIN_TRANSFER_UNIT_BODY). TCP packets larger than this limit, will be split.

Parameter.Name: EthLinkSurveillanceInterv
Parameter.Description: Interval for how often to check link-status on the networkinterfaces specified in Application.xml.

Parameter.Name: LimitTrafficJamReceive_kB_sec
Parameter.Description: Limit for ethernet traffic jam in kB/s (only testing received traffic and if DualEth is enabled). Ethernet interface will be taken down if receiving more than this limit, and EthInterfaceTakenDownTrafficJam-alarm will be Set. Test will not be performed if this limit is 0.0.

Parameter.Name: StatisticsSignalsUpdateInterval
Parameter.Description: Interval whichs decides how often (but not faster than ts) the statistics signals are updated.

Component.Signals:
<Signal Name="EthLinkValue_ETH0" Type="int" Model="CDPSignal<int>" Description="0:Not updated or routing not up yet, >=1:Link established (OK, link up), -1:No link established (ERROR, link down), <=-2:Error or function not supported (ERROR).">
<Signal Name="EthLinkValue_ETH1" Type="int" Model="CDPSignal<int>" Description="0:Not updated or routing not up yet, >=1:Link established (OK, link up), -1:No link established (ERROR, link down), <=-2:Error or function not supported (ERROR).">
